body.p: While editing a java source file, if you start to create a logging statement (log.), the logging plugin will attempt to perform the appropriate initialization (imports, static variable) for the configured logging implementation.

ul.li:
g:EclimLoggingDisabled
If set to a value greater than 0, then this plugin will be disabled.

g:EclimLoggingImpl
Determines which logging implementation to use.
Possible values include "commons-logging", "slf4j", "log4j", and "jdk".
Defaults to "commons-logging" as both the commons-logging impl and the slf4j replacement can be used.
